attributes.action: Ask Parliament to debate whether or not the Prime Minister should resign.
attributes.additional_details: The prime minister has showed lack of leadership in the way he has managed the response to the pandemic. He has lost the trust of the British people and is no longer fit to be in office
attributes.background: Demand that the prime minister resigns.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
